contentItemData.label: WiSeConnect 3 SDK NCP Getting Started Guide
contentItemData.description: Get started with developing an application for the SiWx91x™ chipset family using the WiSeConnect™ SDK v3.x with an EFR32™ host in Network Co-Processor (NCP) mode, where the application runs on the EFR32 host and the connectivity stack runs on the SiWx91x chipset.

contentItemData.label: WiSeConnect 3 SDK NCP Release Notes
contentItemData.description: Release Notes for the WiSeConnect 3 SDK for NCP mode development. These release notes provide information on the release including part compatibility, changes, and supported features.

contentItemData.label: WiSeConnect 3 SDK SoC Getting Started Guide
contentItemData.description: Get started with running the out-of-box demo for the SiWx91x™ chipset family using the WiSeConnect™ SDK v3.x in System-on-chip (SoC) mode, where both the application and the connectivity stack run on the SiWx91x chipset.

contentItemData.label: SiWx91x Glossary of Terms
contentItemData.description: Glossary of commonly used terms in the SiWx91x™ documentation.

contentItemData.label: WiSeConnect 3 SDK SoC Release Notes
contentItemData.description: Release Notes for the WiSeConnect™ 3 SDK for SoC mode development. These release notes provide information on the release including part compatibility, changes, and supported features.

contentItemData.label: WiSeConnect SDK Migration Guide from v2.x to v3.0.9
contentItemData.description: Guide for updating an existing application using the WiSeConnect™ SDK v2.x to a v3.x application. This guide describes the changes made in the WiSeConnect SDK v3.x to simplify the API and make it modular. It also provides a migration example, and the steps for updating a v2.x application to a v3.x application.

contentItemData.label: WiSeConnect SDK Migration Guide from v3.1.0 to v3.1.1
contentItemData.description: Guide for updating an existing application using the WiSeConnect™ SDK v3.1.0 to a v3.1.1 application. This guide describes the folder changes made in the WiSeConnect SDK v3.1.0 to simplify it and make it easier to understand. It also provides the steps for updating a v3.1.0 application to a v3.1.1 application.

contentItemData.label: WiSeConnect SDK Migration Guide from v3.1.3 to v3.1.4
contentItemData.description: Guide for updating an existing application using the WiSeConnect™ SDK v3.1.3 to a v3.1.4 application. This guide describes the naming and interface changes in v3.1.4, mostly in order to standardize the names and improve the overall usage experience of the application programming interface (API). Migration requires the names everywhere to be updated in the existing code of an application.

contentItemData.label: WiSeConnect SDK Migration Guide from v3.1.4 to v3.2.0
contentItemData.description: Guide for updating an existing application using the WiSeConnect™ SDK v3.1.4 to a v3.2.0 application. This guide describes the naming and interface changes in v3.2.0, mostly in order to standardize the names and improve the overall usage experience of the application programming interface (API). Migration requires the names everywhere to be updated in the existing code of an application.

contentItemData.label: SiWx917 Software Reference Manual
contentItemData.description: This reference manual provides information about the software on the SiWx917™, the first chip in the SiWx91x™ chipset family. It is intended to provide all the details required for a smooth developer experience.

contentItemData.label: WiSeConnect 3 SDK API Reference
contentItemData.description: Guide to the application programming interface (API) of the WiSeConnect™ SDK v3.x, providing details of the functions, data types, constants, and callback frameworks within the various categories of APIs provided by the WiSeConnect™ SDK v3.x.

contentItemData.label: WiSeConnect 3 SDK Developer Documentation
contentItemData.description: This documentation provides a development guide and reference for the SiWx91x™ chipset family using version 3.x (3.0.0 and later) of the WiSeConnect™ software development kit (SDK), a simple-to-use application programming interface (API) for Internet Protocol (IP) networking and connectivity.

contentItemData.label: UG569: BRD8045 Adapter Board for Co-Processor Radio Boards User's Guide
contentItemData.description: User's guide for co-processor adapter boards for applications hosted on EFM32™ or EFR32™ devices, Raspberry Pi or other Linux machines, or STM micorcontrollers.

contentItemData.label: SiWN917 NCP Datasheet
contentItemData.description: Datasheet for SiWN917™ NCP Single Chip Wi-Fi and Bluetooth LE Wireless Secure Solutions.

contentItemData.label: AN1433: SiWN917 NCP Low Power Application Note
contentItemData.description: This application note describes the SiWN917™ power save modes and how to choose power save modes based on application requirements and current consumption analysis during various operational modes in NCP mode.

contentItemData.label: AN1434: SiWN917 NCP Throughput Application Note
contentItemData.description: This application note provides information about the measurement of SiWN917™ throughput performance and throughput observed in different protocols like TCP, UDP, and TLS transmit (tx) / receive (rx) using the WiSeConnect 3 SDK in NCP mode.

contentItemData.label: UG575: SiWN917 NCP Manufacturing Utility User Guide
contentItemData.description: User's guide to the manufacturing utility used to update the MBR, enable security, or perform calibration on SiWN917™.

contentItemData.label: SiWG917 SoC Datasheet
contentItemData.description: Datasheet for SiWG917™ SoC Single Chip Wi-Fi and Bluetooth LE Wireless Secure MCU Solutions.

contentItemData.label: AN1430: SiWG917 SoC Low Power Application Note
contentItemData.description: This application note provides information about the SiWG917™ low power modes and current consumption values in different power modes and power states. It also details the low power examples in the WiSeConnect™ 3 SDK.

contentItemData.label: AN1416: SiWG917 SoC Memory Map Application Note
contentItemData.description: This document is an overview of different memory regions of the SiWG917™ for an optimized application design.

contentItemData.label: AN1431: SiWG917 SoC Firmware Update Application Note
contentItemData.description: This application note describes the firmware update procedure for the SiWG917™. This document covers the firmware load and update process and mechanisms, as well as the importance of secure over-the-air updates with combined images.

contentItemData.label: AN1429: SiWG917 SoC Throughput Application Note
contentItemData.description: This document provides information about SiWG917 supported network protocols, socket configurations and the performance results along with the recommendations and guidelins to achieve the best performance.

contentItemData.label: UG574: SiWG917 SoC Manufacturing Utility User Guide
contentItemData.description: User's guide to the manufacturing utility used to update the MBR, enable security, or perform calibration on SiWG917™.
